name: European Friends of Armenia
legal: Association international sans but lucratif (a.i.s.b.l.) â€“ International non-profit association under Belgian law
goal:
EuFoA is an international NGO which seeks to build bridges between Armenian and European decision makers in the fields of politics, business and culture, and supports Armenia's further integration into European political, economic and social structures. We try to achieve this by widening a network of interested protagonists, offering know-how and contacts for both sides, fostering people-to-people contacts between key members of the civil society and raising awareness of Europe in Armenia and Armenia in Europe.
website: http://eufoa.org/
interests: Culture, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
We follow all developments related to the EU relations with Armenia and its region, including:
- the EU- Armenia negotiations for a new framework agreement;
- the developments related to the Eastern Partnership, especially those processes involving Armenia;
- the developments related to European Neighbourhood Policy in general, including the Single Support Framework for EU support to Armenia;
- all processes related to the promotion of Democracy, Human Rights and the Rule of Law, especially those focusing in Armenia and/or the South Caucasus Region.
